overview: At just 40 years old, Alexis sees her well-ordered life suddenly tip over. She has just lost her husband Dorian in a tragic traffic accident... And also learn that he had been living a double life for many years.  At her husband's funeral, she will meet Cassie, his mistress. Between a feeling of hatred and guilt, Alexis is going to face the unspoken fantasies of her late husband, with Cassie by her side.
tagline: At 40, she now intends to make the most of her new life.
title: A 40 Year Old Widow
